mean_en: to make a liquid or other substance flow from a container in a continuous stream, especially by holding the container at an angle; (of liquid, smoke, light, etc.) to flow quickly in a continuous stream; to serve a drink by letting it flow from a container into a cup or glass
sentence: The milk is being poured into the glass.
sentence_trans: 牛奶正被倒进玻璃杯里。
